document.full_text: the opposition socialist party comprehensively won french local elections on sunday as the far-right national front surged, between them pressuring president nicolas sarkozy a year before he faces the electorate.
document.title: sarkozy squeezed by left and right in french polls
lines_and_colors: the opposition socialist party comprehensively won french local elections on sunday as the far-right national front surged, between them pressuring president nicolas sarkozy a year before he faces the electorate.
